price: Say, “Each of us is waiting[53], so wait! You will come to know who are the people of the straight path and who are rightly guided.”
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
footnotes: [53] For the end result of this matter.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul kullun mutarabbiṣun fatarabbaṣū fasataʿlamūna man aṣḥābu al-ṣirāṭi al-sawiyi wamani ih'tadā
